changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Optimisation du code en cas de Sonos non: Code optimization in case of Sonos not connected
changelog.md.Correction de bug si un sonos n'est pas: Bug fix if a sound system cannot be reached
changelog.md.Amélioration du script d'installation de: Improvement of the dependencies installation script (may allow TTS concerns to be corrected in certain cases)
changelog.md.Support de l'enceinte lampe Ikea SYMFONI: Support for the Ikea SYMFONISK lamp speaker
changelog.md.Support de l'enceinte étagere Ikea SYMFO: Support for the Ikea SYMFONISK shelf enclosure
changelog.md.Ajout des sonos one gen2: Addition of one gen2 sound systems
changelog.md.Correction de bugs dans le cas ou les so: Fixed bugs in case the sound systems were added manually
changelog.md.IMPORTANT NE MARCHE QUE AVEC PHP7, VOIR: IMPORTANT ONLY WORKS WITH PHP7, SEE JEEDOM HEALTH PAGE FOR YOUR VERSION
changelog.md.Support de la nouvelle api Sonos: Support for the new Sonos API
changelog.md.Support des sonos beam et One: Support for sonos beam and One
changelog.md.Certain fonction on du être retirées: Certain function should have been removed
changelog.md.Ajout de picotts pour la génération du T: Addition of picotts for local TTS generation
changelog.md.Correction du bouton play\/pause lors de: Correction of the play / pause button when updating the widget

index.md.Le plugin Sonos permet de piloter les So: The Sonos plugin allows you to control the Sonos Play 1, 3, 5, Sonos Connect, Sonos Connect AMP, Sonos Playbar, Ikea Symfonisk ... It will allow you to see the state of the Sonos and to perform actions on it (play, pause, next, previous, volume, choice of a playlist…
index.md.La configuration est très simple, après: The configuration is very simple, after downloading the plugin, you just need to activate it and that's it
index.md.Le plugin va rechercher les Sonos sur vo: The plugin will search for Sonos on your network and create the equipment automatically
index.md.De plus, s'il y a une correspondance ent: In addition, if there is a match between Jeedom objects and Sonos rooms, Jeedom will automatically assign Sonos to the right rooms
index.md.Lors d ela decouverte initial il est for: During the initial discovery it is strongly advised not to have grouped sound systems on pain of having errors
index.md.Si plus tard vous ajoutez un Sonos, vous: If you later add a Sonos, you can either create a Sonos device by giving Jeedom the IP or click on "Search for Sonos devices
index.md.découvre automatiquement les sonos (ne m: automatically discover the sound systems (does not work on a docker type installation where each sound system must be created by hand
index.md.Les messages trop longs ne peuvent être: Messages that are too long cannot be transmitted in TTS (the limit
index.md.dépend du fournisseur de TTS, en général: depends on the TTS provider, usually around 100 characters
index.md.La configuration des équipements Sonos e: The configuration of Sonos equipment is accessible from the Plugins menu then multimedia
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.le rend visible sur le dashboard: makes it visible on the dashboard
index.md.le modèle de votre Sonos (à ne changer q: the model of your Sonos (only change if it is not the right one
index.md.l'IP de votre Sonos, peut être utile si: the IP of your Sonos, can be useful if your Sonos changes IP or if you replace it
index.md.En-dessous vous retrouvez la liste des c: Below you find the list of orders
index.md.permet d'afficher la configuration avanc: displays the advanced configuration of the command (logging method, widget, etc.)
index.md.commande de type message permettant de l: message type command to launch a playlist, just put the name of the playlist in the title
index.md.Vous pouvez mettre \"random\" dans messa: You can put "random" in message to mix the playlist before playing
index.md.commande de type message permettant de l: command of the message type allowing to launch a favorites, it suffices in the title to put the name of the favorites
index.md.Vous pouvez mettre \"random\" dans messa: You can put "random" in message to mix favorites before reading
index.md.commande de type message permettant de l: command type message to launch a radio, just in the title to put the name of the radio (BE CAREFUL this must be in the favorite radios
index.md.permet d'ajouter un haut-parleur (un Son: allows to add a speaker (a Sonos) to the current speaker (to associate 2 Sonos for example
index.md.Il faut mettre le nom de la pièce du son: You have to put the name of the sonos room to add in the title (the message field is not used here
index.md.permet de supprimer un haut-parleur (un: allows you to delete a speaker (a Sonos) from the current speaker (to dissociate 2 Sonos for example
index.md.Il faut mettre le nom de la piéce du Son: You have to put the name of the Sonos part to delete in the title (the message field is not used here
index.md.indique si on est en mode aléatoire ou n: indicates if we are in random mode or not
index.md.inverse le statut du mode aléatoire: reverse the status of random mode
index.md.indique si on est en mode répété ou non: indicates if we are in repeat mode or not
index.md.inverse le statut du mode \"répéter: reverse the status of the "repeat" mode
index.md.nom de la piste en cours de lecture: name of the track currently playing
index.md.permet de lire un texte sur le Sonos (vo: allows to read a text on Sonos (see TTS part
index.md.Dans le titre vous pouvez mettre le volu: In the title you can set the volume and in the message, the message to read
index.md.Pour la lecture des playlists vous pouve: For playing playlists you can put options (in the option box
index.md.Pour lancer la playlist en lecture aléat: To start the playlist in random reading you have to put in "random
index.md.Le TTS (text-to-speech) vers le Sonos né: TTS (text-to-speech) to Sonos requires having Windows (Samba) sharing on the network (imposed by Sonos, no way to do otherwise
index.md.Il faut vous donc un NAS sur le réseau: So you need a NAS on the network
index.md.La configuration est assez simple il fau: The configuration is quite simple you have to put the name or the ip of the NAS (be careful to put the same thing as what is declared on Sonos) and the path (relative), the user name and the password ( attention the user must have write rights
index.md.Il faut absolument mettre un mot de pass: It is absolutely necessary to put a password for this to work
index.md.Il faut aussi absolument un sous-réperto: A subdirectory is also absolutely necessary for the voice file to be correctly created
index.md.Voici un exemple de configuration (merci: Here is an example of configuration (thanks @masterfion
index.md.Côté NAS, voici ma config: NAS side, here is my config
index.md.l'utilisateur Sonos a un accès Lecture\/: Sonos user has Read / Write access (necessary for Jeedom
index.md.l'utilisateur guest a un accès en Lectur: guest user has read-only access (required for Sonos
index.md.Côté Plugin Sonos, voici ma config: Sonos Plugin side, here is my config
index.md.Il faut ABSOLUEMENT ajouter le partage r: ABSOLUTELY add network sharing in the sound library, otherwise Jeedom will create the mp3 for the tts but it cannot be played by the Sonos
index.md.La lanque dépend de la langue de Jeedom: Language depends on Jeedom language and uses picotts by default
index.md.il sera possible d'utiliser le TTS de Go: it will be possible to use Google TTS to have a prettier voice
index.md.Le plugin Sonos met aussi à disposition: The Sonos plugin also provides a panel that brings together all of your Sonos
index.md.Disponible à partir du menu Accueil → So: Available from the Home menu → Sonos Controller
index.md.Pour avoir le panel il faut l'activer da: To have the panel you have to activate it in the plugin configuration
index.md.Erreur \"No devices in this collection\": "No devices in this collection" error when searching for equipment
index.md.Cette erreur arrive si la decouverte aut: This error occurs if the automatic discovery is blocked (router which blocks the boradcast for example
index.md.Ce n'est pas grave il vous faudra juste: It does not matter you will just have to add your sonos by hand specifying the model and IP
index.md.J'ai des soucis sur TTS (en boucle), les: I have concerns on TTS (in loop), the radios do not work, I have bizarre errors
index.md.Avant toute chose la 1er chose à faire e: First of all the first thing to do in case of problems is to disconnect all the Sonos, reconnect them to wait until they start and then restart the Sonos demon in Jeedom
index.md.En général cela résoud 90% des problèmes: In general this solves 90% of the problems
